channel.title: Question
channel.description:
I know this isn't development and what not, but just need something answered for me, and I figured this would be the place to ask.
I've heard rumors of JaGex selling RSC? Is this true, and if it is, can someone give me some incite to this please.
If not, then just simply say its not.
No flame required.

item.title: Question
item.dc:creator: @Aqua_link Aqua link
item.description:
@Aqua_link wrote:

[quote=“KO9, post:6, topic:224533”][quote author=Aqua link link=topic=295005.msg2373543#msg2373543 date=1218326919]
Why would you sell RSC if it is also made into Rs2? its like selling rs2 alone :|[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 09, 2008, 06:09:48 pm[/size][hr][quote author=zraffz link=topic=295005.msg2371837#msg2371837 date=1218255266]
I don’t know but I don’t see why it matters…
It’s not likely that any of us could afford it.

[/quote]
It would be about 20 buck since its old rofl
[/quote]

How is it?

TBH: I don’t think Jagex would ever sell RSC, even if you offered them a mill or two. If they wanted to make money off of it they could just re-open it purely as pay-only and still make a shit load… Seems like they just want the game to die[/quote]
right, you got a point my bad :|[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 09, 2008, 08:50:24 pm[/size][hr][quote=“bigh51, post:7, topic:224533”][quote author=Aqua link link=topic=295005.msg2373543#msg2373543 date=1218326919]
Why would you sell RSC if it is also made into Rs2? its like selling rs2 alone :|[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 09, 2008, 06:09:48 pm[/size][hr][quote author=zraffz link=topic=295005.msg2371837#msg2371837 date=1218255266]
I don’t know but I don’t see why it matters…
It’s not likely that any of us could afford it.

[/quote]
It would be about 20 buck since its old rofl
[/quote]You’re an idiot. People have sold edited demonik_v7 sources for $30… It would be way more than 20, try 200 thousand.[/quote]
kk i get it

Read full topic

How is it?

TBH: I don’t think Jagex would ever sell RSC, even if you offered them a mill or two. If they wanted to make money off of it they could just re-open it purely as pay-only and still make a shit load… Seems like they just want the game to die
